title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option does not always work. After creating a new file, f1.txt, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not have any effect.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software using build 20020508.
2. Create a new file, f1.txt.
3. Go to the file menu and select 'Close All Saved'.
4. Observe that nothing happens and the file remains open.
